page.title: 15RECREATION IN WINGERWORTH
page.content:
We decided to find out what the residents of{Wingerworth}thought about their village. We made a list of all the leisure activities that Wingerworth has to offer. They are:
{Tennis courts Church activities {Bowls Club Church Youth Club {Dancing classes BMX Course {Cubs,Scouts Over 60's Club {Brownies,Guides Parks {Youth Club Lido {Play Group Library {Broomhead Nursery Garden Centre
We asked people which they most frequently used. The{Lido}(page 4) was most popular, followed closely by {Cubs,Scouts,Brownies}and{Guides.}All families asked used at least one of the leisure facilities provided for them in Wingerworth.
